mapper.insert: insert into product(p_name, p_price, p_category, p_category_detail, p_alc, p_sweet, p_sour, p_img, p_info_img, p_stock) values(#{p_name},#{p_price},#{p_category},#{p_category_detail},#{p_alc},#{p_sweet},#{p_sour},#{p_img},#{p_info_img},#{p_stock})

select.if: select * from product order by p_cnt desc
